item.title: Experimental labs with computer simulations
item.description: While teaching laboratories for caclus-based Phyisics I fugured out there is no teaching curriculum available wich would combine actuall experiments with computer (or also called numerical) simulations. So, I developed a sequence fo 7 lab modules to implement exactly that.
